TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaWhiteSpaceFacet extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaFacet

summary.span: Representa a faceta do W3C (World Wide Web Consortium).

span.span: Represents the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) facet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe define como o espaço em branco do valor de simpleType será tratado.The class defines how the simpleType value's white space will be treated. O `whiteSpace` o valor da faceta pode ser um dos `preserve`, `replace`, ou `collapse`.The `whiteSpace` facet value can be one of `preserve`, `replace`, or `collapse`. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso da `XmlSchemaWhiteSpaceFacet` classe.The following example shows the use of the `XmlSchemaWhiteSpaceFacet` class.
